title: Little Smiles 😄
description:
In celebration of World Smile Day, Nikki tells Mr. Malone a whole bunch of small, smile-worthy stories from around the world. Get ready to grin! And stay tuned to the end of the show. We have a special treat for you from LA’s Da Poetry Lounge esteemed poet, Tonya Ingram.

Follow Mr. Malone on Twitter and Instagram

Follow Tonya Ingram, our featured poet, on Instagram, Twitter, and online

Follow Da Poetry Lounge on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, and online

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Join the Trends community! Get your first two weeks for $1 at trends.co/SMILE
